name: speedball-hub
description: A comprehensive web application for managing speedball sport data for Rowad club

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.setup: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build -d && sleep 15 && docker exec speedball-app-dev sh -c 'cd /app/apps/backend && npm run db:setup'
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend

author: Rowad Club
